funding_condition IN ('펀딩오픈예정','펀딩중','펀딩마감', '펀딩완료')
order by funding_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FUNDING ( funding_title, funding_name, funding_serial, funding_brand, funding_category, funding_content, funding_image, funding_start, funding_end, funding_goal, funding_totalprice, funding_condition, funding_gift, funding_id ) VALUES ( #{fundingTitle}, #{fundingName}, #{fundingSerial}, #{fundingBrand}, #{fundingCategory}, #{fundingContent}, #{fundingImage}, #{fundingStart}, #{fundingEnd}, #{fundingGoal}, #{fundingTotalprice}, #{fundingCondition}, #{fundingGift}, f_seq.nextval )
mapper.select: SELECT funding_id, funding_title, funding_name, funding_serial, funding_brand, funding_category, funding_content, funding_image, funding_start, funding_end, funding_goal, funding_totalprice, funding_condition, funding_gift, (CASE WHEN funding_condition='펀딩오픈예정' THEN 'D - ' || TO_CHAR(funding_start - TRUNC(sysdate)) WHEN funding_start = TRUNC(sysdate) THEN 'D - DAY ' WHEN funding_condition='펀딩중' THEN 'D + ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate) - funding_start) END) AS funding_dday FROM funding WHERE funding_id = #{fundingId}
mapper.update: UPDATE funding SET funding_title = #{fundingTitle}, funding_name = #{fundingName}, funding_serial = #{fundingSerial}, funding_brand = #{fundingBrand}, funding_category = #{fundingCategory}, funding_content = #{fundingContent}, funding_image = #{fundingImage}, funding_start = #{fundingStart}, funding_end = #{fundingEnd}, funding_goal = #{fundingGoal}, funding_totalprice = #{fundingTotalprice}, funding_condition = #{fundingCondition}, funding_gift = #{fundingGift} WHERE funding_id = #{fundingId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FUNDING_JOIN ( funding_join_id, member_id, funding_id, funding_price, funding_gift ) VALUES ( j_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{fundingId}, #{fundingPrice}, #{fundingGift} )
